sentence: ? NC-11: While freshman Rep. Madison Cawthorn's failed district swap, pro-Putin declarations, and evidence-free "orgy" allegations have motivated several prominent North Carolina Republicans to try to beat him in next month's primary, the party's biggest name is still very much in his corner.
title: Morning Digest: Why Trump pick needs to defend her 'bona fides' to get back on primary ballot
